commanders.name: Dihada, Binder of Wills
commanders.oracleText:
[+2]: Up to one target legendary creature gains vigilance, lifelink, and indestructible until your next turn.
[−3]: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put any number of legendary cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Create a Treasure token for each card put into your graveyard this way.
[−11]: Gain control of all nonland permanents until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.
Dihada, Binder of Wills can be your commander.

cards.name: Adriana, Captain of the Guard
cards.oracleText:
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
Other creatures you control have melee. (If a creature has multiple instances of melee, each triggers separately.)

cards.name: Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
cards.oracleText:
First strike
Whenever Alesha attacks, you may pay {W/B}{W/B}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

cards.name: Anafenza, Kin-Tree Spirit
cards.oracleText: Whenever another nontoken creature you control enters, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Ashling the Pilgrim
cards.oracleText: {1}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ashling. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, remove all +1/+1 counters from Ashling, and it deals that much damage to each creature and each player.

cards.name: Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant
cards.oracleText:
Note the mana value of each card as it's put into exile.
Bell Borca's power is equal to the greatest number noted for it this turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

cards.name: Captain Lannery Storm
cards.oracleText:
Haste
Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Etali, Primal Storm

cards.name: Garna, the Bloodflame

cards.name: Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
cards.oracleText: Whenever Krenko attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

cards.name: Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion
cards.oracleText:
Trample
Whenever Neheb deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may discard any number of cards. If you do, draw that many cards and add that much {R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

cards.name: Odric, Lunarch Marshal
cards.oracleText: At the beginning of each combat, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance.
